content.description:
Same start as Orgasm. Get on the ledge and then carefully follow the crack up and right to a hole (balancy). Head straight up from there through some pumpy crimps and a mantle top out 

  Dixie's calls this a straight 10. I thought it seemed harder than that
content.protection:
Kinda sparse pro. You can get something in the hole and then little else thru the crux above. 

  Anchor bolts at top shared with Orgasm
content.location: Walk around to the left to find a small gully that will access the top. Else there are countless other trails that will also put you up there.

content.description: start by climbing up to small ledge. stand up and grab for flakes. mantle onto next ledge and you're done
content.protection: small gear in flake and bolts on top for anchor/top rope
content.location: middle route on X Wall. look for ledge at chest height.

content.description: Short, steep, small wall on the way to the Main Face. Definitely worth a visit.
